mapper.sql: Id, TKDType, IsVisible, WebId, PageUrl, Title, KeyWords, DisCription, LastUpdateTime
mapper.select:
select top 1
from tbl_TKD
IsVisible = #{IsVisible} AND
TKDType = #{TKDType} AND
PageUrl like '%/'+ #{webdomain}+'/' AND
1 = 1
ORDER BY Id DESC
mapper.insert:

Id,

update tbl_TKD
TKDType = #{tkdtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsVisible = #{isvisible,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WebId = #{webid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PageUrl = #{pageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KeyWords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DisCription = #{discription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LastUpdateTime = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
